remarks: The coefficient vector of an addition.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Mar-2015.)
statement:
coe1add.y $e |- Y = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
coe1add.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
coe1add.p $e |- .+b = ( +g ` Y ) $.
coe1add.q $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
coe1add $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) -> ( coe1 ` ( F .+b G ) ) = ( ( coe1 ` F ) oF .+ ( coe1 ` G ) ) ) $.
